Package gw.api.print

Class PrintOutAction

java.lang.Object
gw.api.print.PrintAction
gw.api.print.AbstractCCPrintAction
gw.api.print.PrintOutAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrintNoteAction
public class PrintOutAction extends AbstractCCPrintAction
Handles the generation of print outs. A print out is an aggregation of one or more different pages in a single large print operation. Print outs are configured and customized through PCF configuration files using the PrintOut tag.

Internal use only; should only be accessed through a PrintOutButtonWidget action listener.

Author:
pyoung

    • printPrintOut

      public static void printPrintOut(PrintSettings settings)
      Executes output of a print out. This call should never be made outside of a PrintOutButton. Internal use only.
      Parameters:
      settings - print settings to apply to the entire print out.

    • generateContent

      Parameters:
